description: Support for Green Party candidate grows as some voters stress the need to break away from Democrats and Republicans.

author: Al Jazeera Staff
title: US election results: Key takeaways as Trump wins
description: Trump makes inroads with Black voters; projected to win swing states North Carolina, Georgia, Pennsylvania and Wisconsin

author: Devin Dwyer, Sarah Herndon, Patty See
title: Poll watchers: Republicans tout 'deterrence' as election officials fear vigilantism
description: Distrust in the American election system among Republican voters has inspired a wave of poll watchers purporting to protect against fraud in battleground states.

author: Oren Oppenheim, Julian Kim, Geoffrey Skelley
title: Here's how presidential election recounts work in key swing states
description: Here’s what to know about the rules that govern if and how presidential race recounts are conducted in each of the seven swing states.

author: Al Jazeera
title: Investors on the watch for who will be next US president
description: Caution prevailed on Monday as the winner of the tightly contested presidential election may be unknown for days.

author: Al Jazeera
title: US agencies allege Russia link to video falsely claiming Georgia vote fraud
description: Russia has previously dismissed allegations it is attempting to interfere in US presidential election.

author: Sarah Shamim
title: US election: Who do world leaders prefer for president – Harris or Trump?
description: From Putin to Xi Jinping, European and NATO leaders to India's Modi, who would world leaders prefer in the White House?

title: U.S. citizens in Canada should vote electronically if they can, Democrat group warns
description: An arm of the Democratic party is warning U.S. citizens planning to vote from Canada of the impact a possible postal strike, and to vote electronically or send their ballot by courier.

author: Al Jazeera Staff
title: US election 2024 results: How Black voters shifted towards Trump
description: Trump almost doubles support among Black voters compared with 2020, exit polls say. How and where? We break it down.

author: Al Jazeera
title: Democrat Gallego wins Arizona, Republicans hold 53-47 US Senate majority
description: The last pending Senate race of the 2024 election has been called, meaning Republicans will hold a three-seat majority.
